extendedInfo.description: Progress through the ages of time, beginning from the stone age all the way to the nuclear age in âThe Warsâ.The idea of the game is simple - destroy your enemy base. Think strategically and tactically decide the balance between both attack and defense to succeed. Remember that you cannot repair your base during battle. As you progress and kill all the enemies you will collect experience points, spend these to move onto the next of 5 available ages. Each age has its own unique units, defense levels and special weapons for when it gets heated! Try the medium and hard levels for more of a challenge to become a War master!(NOTE: May not work on rooted devices)

reviews.author: rodney webbe

reviews.title: Great idea, but doesn\'t play well
reviews.comment: Its fun at first. I love anything with civilization/rise of nations style technology progression. I\'m not too crazy about this one though. It needs more variety and balance. After you get the hang of the game play, it feels very mechanical. It doesn\'t really seem to make any difference what you do, the computer is always neck and neck with you in technology and throwing units at you all day. You have to kill its units to progress and build, but it progresses and builds no matter what. There isn\'t really any strategy or skill involved. You just have to survive by building canons and advancing your technology until the end. As far as I can tell, there is no way to win until you have enough money to buy the final, invincible, super unit. Kind of lame.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Waste
reviews.comment: Cool concept but really boring game play. No reason reward for winning  on easier levels. Waste of money.
